ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I think they need to redo the spawn rate on this dirk.  it is too frequent. Last night I went and tried to get a dirk.  I was expecting to sit around for hours
ygData.messageBody:
I think they need to redo the spawn rate on this dirk. it is too frequent.
Last night I went and tried to get a dirk. I was expecting to sit around
for hours but as I get there, there were 6 campers of lvl 20+. I asked them
if I can get a dirk and they said sure. So I got one for free in 15 minutes
of getting to CB. Then one of the guy left so I join their team to get
another one for my other rogue char. To keep the story short, Divinni spawn
every 15 minutes, and each time he has the dirk. We were giving the dirk
away to our friends, relatives, and just unknown plp. I just think that a
weapon of that power should be more rare or harder to get. This dirk is
better than a well balance ls!!!!! So now I have 2 dirk. 1 for me lvl 17
bard and 1 for my lvl 17 rogue.

This is just my 2 coppers.
Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
